name: Evan Clark

projects.title: NLP on OkCupid Data
projects.description: Using Natural Language Processing I was able to vectorize the self-introductions of OkCupid Profiles and compare them to metrics of said profile. These comparisions were then processed by the Multi-layered Perceptron machine learning model to predict traits about the users from introduction alone.

projects.title: Spotitime
projects.description: A simple webapp I made to create a playlist of random songs on your spotify profile that is approximitaly as long as the time you input.

services.title: New Service
services.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

aboutpara:
Effective communication has always been at the core of my professional journey. I firmly believe that clear and concise communication is essential for successful collaboration and project execution. Whether it's expressing complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders or fostering seamless teamwork within a development team, I pride myself on my ability to convey information in a way that is easily understood and resonates with different audiences.

In terms of technical abilities, I have engaged in a wide range of projects in all the most common programming languages. For the hobby projects you’ll find on my GitHub, I primarily use Python. Throughout my professional experience I have mostly used C# and worked on the backend, with occasional help in JS and React for the frontend. In my post-secondary I able to briefly touch on all the most common programming languages, and learn the latest professional practices.

I would like to honour and recognize the unceded territory of the Coast Salish peoples upon I live.

experiences.bullets: Performed full-stack development for a web app that processes business property expenses. Utilized C# SQL Docker and Azure on the backend to parse and store various rent expense templates. Used React SASS and general JavaScript on the frontend to create an intuitive interface, Worked on integrating Tesseract OCR in Python into other software solutions for reading additional business-related documents in non-text format, Performed the data transfer and setup from on-premise environments to Dynamics 365 with a focus on  SharePoint Online. Utilized PowerShell scripts with SharePoint Cmdlets to streamline the process, Created custom Power-automate flows with Restful APIs to move document sets across SharePoint libraries  without loss of metadata.

Developed excellent communication and leadership skills from working in teams of 7+ lifeguards during emergency situations, Was able to breakdown and explain advanced concepts in my swim classes with students from 3 years old to 60  years old

education.universityPara: Dean’s List – Institutional GPA 3.65, Team Lead for a project-based semester on Android app development. Created a carpool app for students in  Android Studio utilizing Google's Markers and Firebase Database, Upper-Level course work included topics such as Machine Learning, Operating Systems, Network Architecture,  Natural Language Processing, and Scalability of Big Data Processing.
